mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_NUMBER,C.CART_COUNT, U.USER_NUMBER,U.USER_ID, P.PRODUCT_NUMBER,P.PRODUCT_NAME,P.PRODUCT_COLOR,P.PRODUCT_SIZE,P.PRODUCT_QUANTITY,P.PRODUCT_PRICE, p.PRODUCT_QUANTITY * C.CART_COUNT AS TOTAL_COUNT, P.PRODUCT_PRICE * C.CART_COUNT AS TOTAL_PRICE, F.FILE_NAME,F.FILE_UPLOAD_PATH,F.FILE_UUID FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_CART C ON U.USER_NUMBER = C.USER_NUMBER JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = C.PRODUCT_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TBL_FILE F ON F.PRODUCT_NUMBER = P.PRODUCT_NUMBER WHERE U.USER_NUMBER=#{userNumber}
